entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
